instruction: Compare two items and identify the differences.
output: The iPhone 11 is slightly larger, with a 6.1 inch display compared to the 6.7 inch display of the iPhone 12. The iPhone 12 has a better camera system, with a wider angle lens, night mode, and better image stabilization features. The 11 has a softer and curvier design, while the 12 has a more angular look and feel. The 12 also supports the new 5G network, while the 11 does not.
